messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] BIG APOLOGY was Mother-In_law
messages.msgSnippet: I think Yol has already unsubbed.. Or maybe she did ignore the insult.  I havnent talked to her about it.  I am surely not going to point it out to her, that
messages.messageBody:
I think Yol has already unsubbed.. Or maybe she did ignore the insult. I
havnent talked to her about it. I am surely not going to point it out to
her, that would add insult to injury. And dont feel like you have to
apolgize to me, unless it sincere.

Teresa


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] BIG APOLOGY was Mother-In_law
messages.msgSnippet: OH SHIT OH SHIT! I made a HUGE mistake!! I am very very sorry! Teresa, that was immature and nasty of me. Please forgive me. I am really sorry, I thought
messages.messageBody:
OH SHIT OH SHIT! I made a HUGE mistake!!
I am very very sorry!
Teresa, that was immature and nasty of me.
Please forgive me. I am really sorry, I thought someone was telling me to
chill and I responded before reading thouroughly. I relaly put my foot in my
mouth and may have hurt some feelings and I apologize. I am so embarrassed.
Elissa
